articles.title: CMF Phone 1: New details hint at exciting design elements and retail pricing - Android Authority
articles.description: Nothing's sub-brand, CMF is teasing the CMF Phone 1's unique design elements, while a new leak gives us the phone's expected retail pricing.
articles.content:
• Nothings sub-brand, CMF, is teasing its inaugural smartphone, the CMF Phone 1.
  • The teasers so far suggest that the phone will feature a rotary dial and an exposed screw on its back.
